title: Flourish
content:
ish Information

Feint an attack to possibly throw your enemy off balance. Type: Bonus Action Melee

How to unlock Flourish

Flourish can be unlocked by the following types of Weapons

Rapiers Shortswords Scimitars

Flourish Tips & Notes

You gain advantage when attacking off balance enemy. Notes & Tips go here

All Actions in Baldur's Gate 3 Aberrant Shape ♦ Abjure Enemy ♦ Absolute Power ♦ Absorb Elements (Reaction) ♦ Absorb Intellect ♦ Action Surge ♦ Arcane Recovery ♦ Aspect of the Elk ♦ Aspec
